Actions.Text:
-- Requires Keyboard Maestro 8.0.3+set kmInst to system attribute "KMINSTANCE"tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine"	set kmPath to getvariable "local__Path" instance kmInstend tell-- Expand tilde (~) Paths
tell application "System Events"
	set thePathEpanded to POSIX path of disk item kmPath
end tell

-- Convert path to colon-delimited
set item_path to POSIX file thePathEpanded as alias
try	tell application "Finder"		return the POSIX path of (original item of item_path as text)	end tellon error	return ""end try
